backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the ICP backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of the Refresh button in PositionRecovery.tsx, including live data fetching, engine re-execution, UI updates, and loading state handling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short descriptions summarizing each file's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the Collie Trader app that mounts the React root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with six routes wrapped in AppLayout, ThemeProvider (dark), and a Sonner toaster.
frontend/src/components/insights/Sentime: Displays sentiment analysis results for a symbol including bullish/bearish/neutral indicator, RSI progress bar, trend direction, and strength percentage.
frontend/src/components/insights/TrendFo: Renders a trend forecast card with continuation and reversal probability progress bars, a confidence badge, and a list of key factors.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App shell component providing a sticky top navigation bar with desktop links and a mobile slide-out sheet menu for all six routes.
frontend/src/components/recovery/Recover: Card component for a deeply negative position showing P&L, entry/current/stop-loss prices, and an expandable list of recovery strategies with execution buttons.
Displays a recovery progress tracker for a trading symbol, showing initial loss, current loss, recovered amount, a progress bar, and a list of recovery actions taken.
frontend/src/components/risk/LeverageBra: Renders a table of leverage brackets for a selected trading symbol by fetching data from the Binance public API, showing max leverage, notional cap, and maintenance margin ratio.
frontend/src/components/risk/PortfolioEx: Visualizes portfolio risk exposure across different trade modalities using progress bars, calculating each modality's risk amount and percentage of total capital.
frontend/src/components/risk/PositionSiz: An interactive calculator that computes optimal position size based on account balance, risk percentage, entry price, and stop loss, persisting balance to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/risk/TradeSimula: A trade simulator that calculates projected PnL at multiple take-profit levels and stop loss, along with the risk/reward ratio, given entry, direction, and position size inputs.
frontend/src/components/statistics/StatC: A simple reusable stat card component that displays a label, a primary value with optional profit/loss/neutral color coding, and an optional sub-value.
frontend/src/components/trading/BinanceP: Fetches and displays open Binance futures positions including entry price, leverage, and unrealized PnL, with long/short badges and a refresh button.
frontend/src/components/trading/Modality: Renders a trading modality card (Scalping, Day Trade, Swing, Position) displaying trade details like direction, PnL, TP/SL progress, and duration, with controls to toggle live mode, generate trades, and close positions.
frontend/src/components/trading/Reversal: Displays an alert dialog when a market reversal signal is detected, offering options to dismiss, close the trade early, or reverse the position.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both authenticated (Internet Identity) and anonymous access, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinancePairs.ts: Fetches and returns the first 100 USDT-quoted trading pairs from Binance exchange info, with loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCredentials.ts: Manages Binance API credentials state, providing save, test connection, and live trading toggle functionality with detailed error message parsing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useModalityMode.ts: Manages per-modality live/simulated trading mode state, persisting selections to localStorage and gating live mode behind a credentials check.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerformanceStats.t: Loads and refreshes trade performance statistics from storage, exposing per-modality and overall stats with a manual refresh callback.
frontend/src/hooks/usePricePolling.ts: Polls Binance for current prices of given symbols at a configurable interval, returning a price map, last update timestamp, and polling status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module indicating that data fetching is handled via custom hooks using direct Binance API calls rather than the ICP backend.
Periodically checks active trades for reversal signals every 30 seconds, managing a queue of undismissed signals and exposing the most recent active signal.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradeLifecycle.ts: Custom React hook that manages the full lifecycle of trades across four modalities, including generating AI-based trade setups, checking TP/SL conditions on price updates, closing/reversing trades, and persisting state to storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports JetBrains Mono and Inter fonts, configures Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines OKLCH-based CSS design tokens for the dark trading UI theme, and adds trading-specific utility classes like profit/loss colors and glow effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AIInsights.tsx: Page component that fetches and displays AI-driven sentiment analysis, trend forecasts, and trade advice for all active trades, with a manual refresh button and per-modality insight cards.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main trading dashboard page that renders four modality cards with live price polling, handles trade generation and closing, displays Binance positions, and shows reversal alert dialogs when detected.
frontend/src/pages/PositionRecovery.tsx: Page that identifies active trades (and live Binance positions) with more than 20% unrealized loss and generates AI recovery strategies, displaying them with progress tracking and action history.
frontend/src/pages/RiskManagement.tsx: Risk management page that renders a position size calculator, portfolio exposure overview, leverage bracket table, and trade simulator using active trade and live price data.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page component for managing Binance API credentials (key/secret) with show/hide toggles, save, and connection test functionality, plus a live trading toggle.
frontend/src/pages/Statistics.tsx: Statistics page that displays overall and per-modality trading performance metrics (win rate, P&L, R:R, streaks, etc.) using StatCard components, with a refresh button.
frontend/src/services/ai/aiTradeSelectio: AI trade selection service that fetches USDT perpetual symbols, scores them via the pair scoring engine, and builds TradeSetup objects using SMC indicators (BOS, FVG, Order Blocks) and ATR-based SL/TP calculations.
frontend/src/services/ai/marketReversalD: Detects market reversal signals (CHoCH and Breaker Blocks) against an open trade's direction using SMC indicators, returning a ReversalSignal if a threat is found.
frontend/src/services/ai/pairScoringEngi: Multi-factor pair scoring engine that combines SMC signals (BOS, FVG, Order Blocks, CHoCH), candlestick pattern detection, RSI, and ATR to score and rank trading symbols for a given modality.
frontend/src/services/ai/positionRecover: Generates recovery strategies (average down, OB-based averaging, partial close, DCA schedule, hedge) for a losing trade using kline data, ATR, and order block detection.
frontend/src/services/ai/sentimentAnalyz: Analyzes market sentiment for a symbol using RSI, 20/50-period moving averages, and price trend to return a SentimentResult with bullish/bearish/neutral classification and strength score.
frontend/src/services/ai/smcIndicators.t: Provides SMC (Smart Money Concepts) technical indicator functions including Kline parsing, Break of Structure (BOS) detection, Fair Value Gap (FVG) detection, and Order Block detection from candle data.
frontend/src/services/ai/tradeAdvisor.ts: Analyzes an active trade and current price to generate actionable advice such as tightening stop loss, taking partial profits, or closing early based on PnL and proximity to TP/SL levels.
frontend/src/services/ai/trendForecaster: Forecasts trend continuation vs. reversal probability for a symbol using RSI, ATR, price momentum, and volume analysis, returning a confidence-rated forecast object.
frontend/src/services/binance/binanceAcc: Provides authenticated Binance Futures API calls for fetching account info, open position risk, placing orders, and cancelling orders.
frontend/src/services/binance/binanceAut: Handles Binance API credential storage in localStorage, HMAC-SHA256 request signing via the Web Crypto API, and provides authenticated and public fetch helpers targeting fapi.binance.com.
frontend/src/services/binance/binancePub: Exposes unauthenticated Binance Futures public API calls for exchange info, ticker prices, klines, and leverage bracket data.
frontend/src/services/statistics/perform: Calculates and persists trade statistics (win rate, avg R:R, streaks, TP/SL hit counts, etc.) per trading modality and overall from closed trade history.
frontend/src/services/storage/tradeStora: Manages localStorage persistence for active trades, closed trade history (capped at 500), and trade statistics, with typed load/save/clear helpers.
frontend/src/services/trading/orderExecu: Wraps trade open and close logic to either execute real market orders on Binance Futures (when live mode is enabled and credentials exist) or simulate them silently.
frontend/src/services/trading/tradeLifec: Manages trade lifecycle events including PnL calculation, TP/SL checks with automatic breakeven adjustment after TP1, and manual trade closure, persisting closed trades and updating statistics.
frontend/src/types/binance.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Binance Futures API data structures including exchange info, klines, account assets, positions, orders, and order placement parameters.
frontend/src/types/trade.ts: Core TypeScript type definitions for the trading system, including enums for modality, direction, and status, plus interfaces for Trade, ClosedTrade, TradeSetup, TradeStatistics, ReversalSignal, and RecoveryStrategy.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color palette (including profit/loss/terminal colors), custom fonts, border radius, box shadows, and animation keyframes for the trading UI.
project_state.json: Project state document describing Collie Trader's architecture, features, and known issues â€” a frontend-only React/TypeScript PWA for Binance Futures trading with AI pair selection combining SMC and 8 fundamental analysis modules.
